name: Monday Morning
description:
It's 7:00am, and you need to leave the house for work by 9:00am. But you've forgotten to get everything ready the night before! Can you get to work in time?

This is a single-player, first-person timed game. It was developed using Unity 5 during the Global Game Jam 16 with the theme of "Ritual".

Developed by Sumo Knitting Club:

Programmers:
Stuart McEwan
Dean Sinclair
